001.gif: 1. Raise arm over the same shoulder and reach for mid back.</br>2.Use other hand and push the elbow down towards shoulder.</br>3. Hold for 10 seconds.</br>4. Repeat for other arm.</br>

002.gif: 1. Raise straighted arm upward.</br>2. Tilt body sideways and bring outstretched arm towards opposite side.</br>3. Hold for 10 seconds.</br>4. Repeat for the other arm.</br>

003.gif: 1. Raise both arms and hold them together above head.</br>2. Push arms upward and stretch.</br>3. Hold for 10 seconds.</br>

004.gif: 1. Bring both arms behind back and interlock them with palms facing back.</br>2. Push chest foward, raise chin.</br>3. Hold pose for 10 seconds.</br>

005.gif: 1. Bring both arms straight forward.</br>2. Lower head forward in line with arms and reach fowward.</br>3. Hold pose for 10 seconds.</br>

006.gif: 1.Keep feet planted, facing forward.</br>2. Place one arm on the back of your chair, twist upper body in the same direction.</br>3. Hold for 10 Seconds.</br>4. Repeat on other side.</br>

007.png: 1. Hug one knee.</br>2. Pull your knee towards you chest.\3. Hold the pose for 10 seconds.</br>4. Repeat on other knee.</br>

008.png: 1. While seated, extend legs straight outward.</br>2. Keeping legs straight, reach towards your toes.\3. Hold for 10 seconds.</br>4. Repeat on other side.</br>

009.png: 1. Raise both shoulders upwards.</br>2. Drop shoulders back down.\3. Repeat 10 times.</br>

010.png: 1. Lean head forward.</br>2. Roll head towards oneside and hold for 10 seconds.\3. Reset head back to start, and go in different direciton.</br>4. Repeat 3 times for each direction.</br>

011.png: 1. Using one arm, pull head to the same side.</br>2. Hold the pose for 10 seconds where a light stretch is felt.\3. Alternate to other side.</br>
